data.title: TEX CREATION LTD.
data.meta_description:
TEX CREATION LTD. | ৯৭৩ লিংকডইনে ফলোয়ার। www.texcreation.net | Dear Buyer/Purchase officer
Hi Buyers

May I draw your kind attention please? Our company “TEX CREATIONLTD.” has 24 years experienced to doing readymade garment supply business from Bangladesh with good quality, competitive price and timely delivery. Our products range are casualwear, fashionwear, Kids wear, Sportswear, work workwear, Uniforms, Apron and cotton shopping bags etc.
data.text:
Dear Buyer/Purchase officer Hi Buyers May I draw your kind attention please? Our company “TEX CREATIONLTD.” has 24 years experienced to doing readymade garment supply business from Bangladesh with good quality, competitive price and timely delivery. Our products range are casualwear, fashionwear, Kids wear, Sportswear, work workwear, Uniforms, Apron and cotton shopping bags etc. Our factories are compliance with BSCI, OEKO-TEX, SEDEX, ACCORD, GOTS etc. So if you have any plan for expand your supplier based, I shall request you to kindly check with us. Minimum quantity: We are flexible in this field. Thanking you and waiting for your kind inquiries. With best regards Rezaul Karim Reza Tex Creation Ltd Office: Road No: 10, House No: 525 4TH Floor, Baridhara DOHS, Dhaka-1206, Bangladesh. Tel: 88-02-8413421, Mobile: 01841 400853, 01819 400853 Personal cell: 01819 263876 E-mail: Rezaul@texcreation.net Web: www.texcreation.net Skype: Rezaultex
